entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Stephen 1:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 12.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 11.1°C
Wind: SSW 18 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain or rain overnight. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
